description: Add print-optimized CSS using @media print. Hides navigation, adjusts typography for paper, ensures links are readable, and optimizes layout for printing the resume/profile page.

phases.name: Print Base Styles
phases.description: Add @media print query with base styles for paper output

subtasks.title: Add @media print query block with page setup
subtasks.description: Create the @media print block after existing responsive queries. Set page margins, background removal, and base typography adjustments for paper (black text, white background, serif body font for readability)
subtasks.notes: Added @media print block with @page margins (0.75in), background removal (transparent), serif font (Georgia), 12pt font size, black text, white background, and full-width container. Follows existing responsive media query pattern.

subtasks.title: Hide non-essential interactive elements
subtasks.description: Hide navigation (.site-nav), share buttons (.share-section, .share-btn), like buttons (.like-section, .like-btn), email forms (.email-form), and any interactive elements that don't make sense on paper
subtasks.notes: Added display: none !important rules for .site-nav, .share-section, .share-btn, .like-section, .like-btn, and .email-form to hide all interactive elements in print output. Follows existing print stylesheet pattern with proper comments and formatting.

phases.name: Typography and Layout Optimization
phases.description: Optimize typography and layout for paper printing

subtasks.title: Adjust typography for print
subtasks.description: Set appropriate font sizes in pt units for print, adjust line-height for paper readability, ensure headings are properly sized, and use print-friendly colors (black text)
subtasks.notes: Added comprehensive typography adjustments for print: h1=24pt, h2.tagline=11pt, h2.section-title=14pt, h3=12pt. Set line-height to 1.2 for headings and 1.6 for paragraphs. Added orphans/widows controls, page-break-after: avoid for headings, and ensured black text with underlined links for print clarity. All spacing uses pt units appropriate for print media.

subtasks.title: Optimize layout for single-column print
subtasks.description: Remove flex/grid layouts, set content to full width, remove max-width constraints, and ensure proper spacing for paper margins
subtasks.notes: Optimized layout for single-column print by converting all flex/grid layouts to block display, setting content/sidebar/main to 100% width with no padding/margin constraints, and adding proper pt-based spacing for sections, headers, widgets, and images to ensure optimal paper margins.

phases.name: Links and Images
phases.description: Make links readable on paper and optimize images

subtasks.title: Show link URLs after link text
subtasks.description: Use CSS ::after pseudo-element to display link URLs in parentheses after link text for important links. Exclude internal navigation links and keep URLs concise

subtasks.title: Optimize images for print
subtasks.description: Ensure profile image prints at reasonable size, hide decorative images if needed, and add page-break rules to prevent awkward image splits
subtasks.notes: Use break-inside: avoid for images, max-width: 100%

phases.name: Page Breaks and Final Polish
phases.description: Add page break controls and final refinements

subtasks.title: Add page break controls
subtasks.description: Prevent orphans/widows, avoid breaks inside important sections, ensure headings don't appear alone at bottom of page, and add break-after for natural section divisions

subtasks.title: Test and refine print output
subtasks.description: Manual testing using browser print preview, verify all elements display correctly, ensure contact information is visible, and make final adjustments

final_acceptance: Print preview shows clean single-column layout
Navigation and interactive elements are hidden
Links show URLs in parentheses for paper reference
Images print at appropriate sizes without breaking
No awkward page breaks in the middle of sections
